title: SOLD: Complete 153 card 1910 T218 set -nice mid-grade condition - 2 Jack Johnson, Att
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: SOLD: Complete 153 card 1910 T218 set -nice mid-grade condition - 2 Jack Johnson, Att
posts.post_content:
Hi - selling a complete 153 card mid-grade set of the 1910 T218 set. 

This is a fantastic set, highlighted by many legendary boxers, billiards players, golfers and track and field athletes.  This set is fairly consistent in condition, mostly mid-grade VG / VG-EX.  I scanned a bunch of the cards for you to see.  There are just a few with creases, nothing really of note, with the Hoppe Playing card the only real noteworthy card that has a few creases.

Six of the cards in the set were graded, and got between PSA 3-5, which is about where I'd expect many of these to fall.  (Maybe closer to 3 than 5 on most, but probably a fair range.)

The Jack Johnson cards in this condition typically sell around $100 each - many other cards in this set bring in decent dollars, so I think I've priced it pretty fairly based on the value here.
SOLD delivered for the set.  This is an average of $XX per card, whic is more than fair for the grade of the overall set.  No real beaters in the group.  PayPal (F/F preferred), Venmo, check, or any other payment method you would like to use, likely will be accepted.

Thanks for looking!
Scott
